resources.string: Enter the names of the players from first to last\n
Do you really want to go back?
Please enter all names before continuing.
Dominate the Empire: Conquer 16 provinces and control them with at least three armies each.
Control the Seas: Have control of the Mediterranean Sea.
Control the Atlantic: Conquer all coastal provinces of the Atlantic having at least two armies in each maritime province and control of the seas in the Atlantic.
Roman Legacy: Conquer and control all Italian provinces (Cisalpina, Italia, Sardinia, Sicily, Corsica) with at least four armies each.
Scipio Africanus: Conquer all African provinces and maintain control for at least three turns.
Julius Caesar: Conquer all provinces of Gaul (Cisalpine Gaul, Narbonese Gaul, Belgica, Germania Inferior) and control them with at least two armies each.
Paella and Baguette: Conquer all provinces of France and Spain and hold them for two turns.
Return of the Gladiator: Conquer 7 provinces in a single turn.
The Mediterranean Islander: Control all islands in the Mediterranean with at least 3 units each.
The Greek Emperor: Control all of Eastern Europe.
The Great Sultan: Conquer all of Asia Minor up to Egypt (islands are not needed).
The Trinity: Control at least three provinces for each continent (Europe, Africa, Asia) having at least two armies in each province.
The Pirate: Have control of the seas in 7 seas or own 12 ships.
The Warmonger: Conquer 2 territories from each player in the same turn. For each missing player, add 2 territories in total.
Mark Antony: Conquer Narbonese Gaul, Cisalpina, Italia, Egypt, and Greece and hold for 2 turns with 3 troops each.
